invite.title: Gayyaci Mai Kasuwanci
invite.description: Kun san mai kasuwanci wanda ke neman inganta ayyukansa? Raba Dott tare da su!
invite.benefits: Dott yana taimakawa kasuwanci don sarrafa jadawalin aiki, gudanar da dangantakar abokan ciniki da kuma gudanar da biyan ku…ói - duk a cikin manhaja …óaya mai sau∆ôi. Ha…óin ku na iya adana sa'o'in aikin gudanarwa kowace mako.
invite.whatsappPlaceholder: Ha…óa lambar ∆ôasa (misali, +1 don Amurka, +234 don Najeriya)
invite.validationEmail: Don Allah shigar da adireshin imel mai inganci.
invite.validationPhone: Don Allah shigar da lambar waya mai inganci.
invite.successMessage: An aika gayyata cikin nasara ta {{method}} zuwa {{recipient}}!
invite.errorMessage: Aika gayyata ya gaza. Don Allah sake gwadawa.
invite.networkError: Kuskuren hanyar sadarwa. Don Allah duba ha…óin ku kuma sake gwadawa.

emailTemplate.subject: {{name}} ya gayyace ku don shiga Dott - Sau∆ôa∆ôe ayyukan kasuwancin ku
emailTemplate.body:
Sannu,

{{name}} ya gayyace ku don gwada Dott, kayan aiki cikakke don sau∆ôa∆ôe ayyukan kasuwanci.

Me yasa masu kasuwanci suke son Dott?
‚úì Yin lissafin ku…ói ta atomatik da gudanar da biyan ku…ói
‚úì Tsara jadawalin al∆ôawari da tunatarwar abokan ciniki
‚úì Bin diddigin kayayyaki da gudanar da masu siyarwa
‚úì Sarrafa biyan albashi da rahotannin haraji
‚úì Fahimtar kasuwanci da bincike

Fara gwajin kyauta yau:
{{link}}

Mafi kyau,
∆òungiyar Dott
